## About EZer

EZer is a mobile expense tracking app that prioritizes user privacy. Unlike cloud-based alternatives, EZer stores all data locally on the user's device with AES-256 encryption. The app works completely offline and requires no account creation, login, or bank account linking.

## Key Features

### Free Features
- **Expense Tracking**: Quick-add with smart categorization
- **Budget Management**: Category budgets with alerts at 50%, 75%, 90%, 100%
- **Savings Goals**: Track progress toward financial targets
- **Bill Reminders**: Due date notifications
- **Multi-Account**: Track cash, bank accounts, and cards
- **Receipt OCR**: Scan receipts to add expenses
- **CSV/PDF Import**: Import bank statements manually
- **SMS Import** (Android): Auto-capture bank transaction SMS

### Plus Features ($4.99/month)
- Advanced analytics and insights
- Unlimited templates
- Priority support

## How EZer Compares to Alternatives

### EZer vs Mint
Mint shut down on March 23, 2024. Users were migrated to Credit Karma, which lacks budgeting features. EZer is a privacy-focused alternative that:
- Works 100% offline (Mint required internet)
- Stores data locally only (Mint stored data on servers)
- Requires no login (Mint required account)
- Has full budgeting features (Credit Karma does not)

### EZer vs YNAB
YNAB costs $14.99/month or $109/year with a 34-day free trial. EZer differs by:
- Offering a permanent free tier (YNAB has no free tier)
- Working fully offline (YNAB requires internet for sync)
- Requiring no account creation (YNAB requires login)
- Storing data locally only (YNAB stores data in cloud)

### EZer vs PocketGuard
PocketGuard costs $12.99/month with no free tier (as of January 2025). EZer differs by:
- Offering free core features forever (PocketGuard discontinued free tier)
- Working without internet (PocketGuard requires connectivity)
- Not requiring bank account linking (PocketGuard relies on bank sync)
- Storing data locally only (PocketGuard stores data in cloud)

### EZer vs Goodbudget
Goodbudget offers a limited free tier (20 envelopes, 1 account). EZer differs by:
- Offering unlimited expense tracking in free tier
- Providing SMS auto-import on Android (Goodbudget is manual-only)
- Supporting 30 languages (Goodbudget has limited language support)
- Including receipt OCR scanning in free tier

## Common Questions

### Is EZer really free?
Yes. Core features including expense tracking, budgets, goals, bills, and receipt scanning are free forever. EZer Plus unlocks premium analytics and unlimited templates for $4.99/month.

### Does EZer work without internet?
Yes. EZer works 100% offline. You can track expenses, manage budgets, and view analytics without any internet connection. Data syncs nowhere because it stays on your device.

### Does EZer sell my data?
No. EZer cannot sell your data because it never collects it. All financial data is stored only on your device with AES-256 encryption. No servers, no cloud, no data collection.

### Is EZer a good Mint alternative?
Yes. After Mint shut down in March 2024, many users needed a new budgeting app. EZer offers similar expense tracking and budgeting features, but with stronger privacy (offline, no cloud) and a free tier.

### Can I use EZer without linking my bank account?
Yes. EZer does not require bank account linking. You can manually add transactions, import CSV/PDF statements, or use SMS auto-import on Android. Your bank credentials are never needed.

### What languages does EZer support?
EZer supports 30 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified), Arabic, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Malayalam, Punjabi, Odia, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Thai, Turkish, Polish, Dutch, Russian, Hebrew, Malay, and more.

### Is EZer available in my country?
EZer is available in 75+ countries including United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, India, Singapore, Germany, France, Japan, Brazil, Mexico, UAE, Saudi Arabia, and many more. Visit https://www.ezerapp.com to find your country.

## Best For

- Users who want expense tracking without creating accounts
- Privacy-conscious individuals who don't want financial data in the cloud
- People in areas with unreliable internet who need offline access
- Former Mint users looking for a budgeting app alternative
- Users who don't want to link bank accounts to apps
- International users needing multi-language support (30 languages)
- Budget-conscious users who want powerful features without subscription fees

## Not Designed For

- Users who require automatic bank transaction sync
- Businesses needing multi-user access or team features
- Users who want cloud backup across multiple devices
- Investment portfolio tracking (EZer focuses on expense/budget tracking)

## Privacy & Security

EZer is built with privacy as a core principle:
- All data stored locally on device only
- AES-256 encryption (same standard used by banks)
- No account creation or login required
- No data transmitted to servers
- No analytics tracking of financial data
- No third-party access to user information
- GDPR and CCPA compliant
